name: small stone
description: A small, smooth stone. You feel like throwing it.

name: rusty nail
description: It's rusty but should still do its job well enough.

name: flashlight
description: It's a heavy duty, blue and yellow metal flashlight. You'll turn it on when you need to.

name: rusty metal rod
description: It's a sturdy metal rod about an inch and a half in diameter. It has a grip at one end. Maybe it's a handle of some kind.

name: sledgehammer
description: It's heavy! You bet it could do a lot of damage. Loudly.

name: potion of healing
description: It's a glass bottle with a cork stopper. It has red liquid inside and a label that reads "potion of healing".

name: dusty note
description:
"Lowered into darkness, far and out of sight
Plunged into clear waters, etavoner regains its might."

name: etavoner rune
description: You don't know how you know this, but the rune represents the etavoner charm.

name: red fabric
description: The strip of red fabric is faded and tattered.

name: waterlogged journal
description: The cover reads "__HELI_'S JOU__L". It's badly water damaged.
